EmailTemplate.name: Impact and Value Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Impact and Value Report for {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CC PRESENTER
Hi {!Job__c.Account_Sell_1_Name__c}
Attached is the report for the 3 month post program ‘Impact and Value’ survey issued for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} program.
X of X responded. The respondent key is for your eyes only.
Please forward to NAM for discussion.
Cheers
